steps.plaintext: Look for Vermeer's paintbrushes and paints (0/2)
steps.markdown: Look for Vermeer's paintbrushes and paints (0/2)

substeps.plaintext: See the Gameplay Notes section for locations.
substeps.markdown: See the ◀Gameplay Notes▶◁#Gameplay_Notes▷ section for locations.

steps.plaintext: Pass the painting tools to Vermeer
steps.markdown: Pass the painting tools to Vermeer

substeps.plaintext: Investigate all marked glowing indicators in the terrace ponds to find the other "strange stone."
substeps.markdown: Investigate all marked glowing indicators in the terrace ponds to find the other "strange stone."

substeps.plaintext: It is possible to find the strange stones before reaching this step, in which case this step will be skipped.
substeps.markdown: It is possible to find the strange stones before reaching this step, in which case this step will be skipped.

steps.plaintext: Unravel the secret behind Luhua Pool
steps.markdown: Unravel the secret behind Luhua Pool

substeps.plaintext: Climb up to the heads of the two giant statues overlooking Luhua Pool and insert a stone into each of them.
substeps.markdown: Climb up to the heads of the two giant statues overlooking Luhua Pool and insert a stone into each of them.

substeps.plaintext: Use a Geo Elemental Skill to activate the monument at the center of the ruin entrance.
substeps.markdown: Use a ◀Geo▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Geo▷ Elemental Skill to activate the monument at the center of the ruin entrance.

substeps.plaintext: Defeat the 3 Abyss Mages (Cryo, Pyro, and Hydro) that spawn within 90 seconds.
substeps.markdown: Defeat the 3 ◀Abyss Mages▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Abyss_Mages▷ (Cryo, Pyro, and Hydro) that spawn within 90 seconds.

substeps.plaintext: 1 Luxurious Chest and 2 Exquisite Chests are in the ruins.
substeps.markdown: 1 Luxurious Chest and 2 Exquisite Chests are in the ruins.

substeps.plaintext: The quest is considered done after opening the Luxurious Chest.
substeps.markdown: The quest is considered done after opening the Luxurious Chest.

substeps.plaintext: Two Spiders can be found on either end of the ruins, covering the Exquisite Chests.
substeps.markdown: Two ◀Spiders▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Spider▷ can be found on either end of the ruins, covering the Exquisite Chests.
